full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal for Perpetual Care Plan (Giant Mine, NT)

#### Tender Details

| Field                  | Value                                      |
|------------------------|--------------------------------------------|
| **Reference Number**    | WS3983596456-Doc4363750660                 |
| **Amendment Number**    | 6                                          |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3983596456                               |
| **Publication Date**    | January 9, 2024                            |
| **Tender Closing Date** | April 5, 2024, 2:00 PM EST                  |
| **Amendment Date**      | March 20, 2024                             |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | N/A                                        |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | June 23, 2023                             |
| **Tender Status**       | Expired                                    |
| **Category**            | SRV (Services)                             |
| **Commodity Classification** | 81162004 (Database management as a service) |

#### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to develop Version 1 of the Perpetual Care Plan for the Giant Mine in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories. The project involves a contract duration of 3 years plus 2 one-year options. The contractor will be responsible for development of the Perpetual Care Plan.

#### Important Information

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.
* Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.
* No security requirement.

#### Contact Information

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Micah Zacharias
* Email: micah.zacharias@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Telephone: Not available.

#### Additional Resources

* Tender Notice: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18465915?extsite=MTg0NjU5MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18465915?extsite=MTg0NjU5MTVfQU4wMTQ4
